We are kicking off Week 2 of 2026 with some incredible variety in the Microsoft Flight Simulator Marketplace! ğŸŒ While everyone is talking about the big airliners, some absolute scenery gems quietly landed for PC users this week.

From the freezing approaches of Norway to the tropical paradise of Langkawi and a major Aussie overhaul, Iâ€™ve filtered through the noise to show you the best airport and scenery addons you might have missed in the update for the week of Jan 5th.

** featured in this video:**
- ENEV Harstad Narvik (MM Simulations): A stunning gateway to the Lofoten Islands.
- YBBN Brisbane International v2 (Orbx): The major Australian hub gets a massive makeover.
- WMKL Langkawi International (MSK Productions): Perfect for your Asian island-hopping adventures.
- KMMV McMinnville Municipal (msfscenerybuilders): A classic GA stop for Oregon flyers.

If you're looking to expand your world map with high-quality destinations, this breakdown is for you.
